item.title: Books
item.description: Ultralearning Master Hard Skills, Outsmart the Competetion, and Accelerate your career Author: Scott H. Young Reviewed on: 21 January 2024 The author never went to MIT but wanted to learn the CS curriculum of MIT and took up the challenge of teaching himself the entire course in one year, and succesfully completed it. He also learned new languages like French and South Korean in three months each and was able to comfortably talk to native speakers of these languages.
